languages.text: "Наша неуемная сестра присматривает за этими молокососами", {n}— Абеляр бегло оглядывает собрание.{/n} "Да, у нас тут не {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Схола Прогениум{/g}, но сиротам на корабле обеспечен достаточный уход и воспитание".

traits.locale_text: "Наша неуемная сестра присматривает за этими молокососами", {n}— Абеляр бегло оглядывает собрание.{/n} "Да, у нас тут не Схола Прогениум, но сиротам на корабле обеспечен достаточный уход и воспитание".

languages.text: "Our indefatigable sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "It is hardly the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} in here, but we have provided the orphans on our ship with adequate care and instruction."
languages.original_text: "Наша неуемная сестра присматривает за этими молокососами", {n}— Абеляр бегло оглядывает собрание.{/n} "Да, у нас тут не {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Схола Прогениум{/g}, но сиротам на корабле обеспечен достаточный уход и воспитание".

traits.locale_text: "Our restless sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "Sure, it's not the Schola Progenium in here, but we've provided the orphans on our ship with decent care and upbringing."

"Our restless sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "Sure, it's not the Schola Progenium in here, but we've provided the orphans on our ship with decent care and upbringing."

"Our indefatigable sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "It is hardly the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} in here, but we have provided the orphans on our ship with adequate care and instruction."

"Our indefatigable sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "It is hardly the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} in here, but we have provided the orphans on our ship with adequate care and instruction."

"Our indefatigable sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "It is hardly the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} in here, but we have provided the orphans on our ship with adequate care and instruction."

languages.text: “我们坚贞的修女一直在照看这些小家伙。”{n}阿贝拉德瞥了一眼聚集在一起的孩子们。{/n}“这里算不上什么{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}忠嗣学院{/g}，不过我们已经为船上的孤儿们提供了足够的照顾与指导。”
languages.original_text: "Our indefatigable sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "It is hardly the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} in here, but we have provided the orphans on our ship with adequate care and instruction."

traits.locale_text: “我们坚贞的修女一直在照看这些小家伙。”{n}阿贝拉德瞥了一眼聚集在一起的孩子们。{/n}“这里算不上什么{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}忠嗣学院{/g}，不过我们已经为船上的孤儿们提供了足够的照顾与指导。”

languages.text: «La incansable hermana ha estado velando por estos renacuajos». {n}Abelard mira a los niños, reunidos.{/n} «Aunque no seamos precisamente la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}, hemos proporcionado el cuidado y la instrucción adecuados para los huérfanos de la nave».
languages.original_text: "Our indefatigable sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "It is hardly the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} in here, but we have provided the orphans on our ship with adequate care and instruction."

traits.locale_text: «La incansable hermana ha estado velando por estos renacuajos». {n}Abelard mira a los niños, reunidos.{/n} «Aunque no seamos precisamente la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}, hemos proporcionado el cuidado y la instrucción adecuados para los huérfanos de la nave».

languages.text: 「不屈のシスターが、この子たちを見守ってくれています」{n}アベラルドは集まった子供たちに目をやる。{/n}「彼女は{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}とまでは言えませんが、我らの船にいる孤児たちには十分なケアと指導をしています」
languages.original_text: "Our indefatigable sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "It is hardly the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} in here, but we have provided the orphans on our ship with adequate care and instruction."

traits.locale_text: 「不屈のシスターが、この子たちを見守ってくれています」{n}アベラルドは集まった子供たちに目をやる。{/n}「彼女は{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}とまでは言えませんが、我らの船にいる孤児たちには十分なケアと指導をしています」

languages.text: "Unsere unermüdliche Schwester hat diese Welpen im Auge behalten." {n}Abelard betrachtet die versammelten Kinder.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} ist das zwar nicht, aber wir haben den Waisen auf unserem Schiff angemessene Fürsorge und Bildung gewährt."
languages.original_text: "Our indefatigable sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "It is hardly the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} in here, but we have provided the orphans on our ship with adequate care and instruction."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere unermüdliche Schwester hat diese Welpen im Auge behalten." {n}Abelard betrachtet die versammelten Kinder.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} ist das zwar nicht, aber wir haben den Waisen auf unserem Schiff angemessene Fürsorge und Bildung gewährt."

languages.text: « Notre inépuisable sœur veille sur ces jeunes gens depuis qu'ils ont perdu leurs parents, {n}déclare Abélard en regardant les enfants rassemblés.{/n} Nous sommes loin de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}, mais nous faisons notre possible pour subvenir à leurs besoins et leur fournir une éducation adéquate. »
languages.original_text: "Our indefatigable sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "It is hardly the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} in here, but we have provided the orphans on our ship with adequate care and instruction."

traits.locale_text: « Notre inépuisable sœur veille sur ces jeunes gens depuis qu'ils ont perdu leurs parents, {n}déclare Abélard en regardant les enfants rassemblés.{/n} Nous sommes loin de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}, mais nous faisons notre possible pour subvenir à leurs besoins et leur fournir une éducation adéquate. »

languages.text: "Yorulmak nedir bilmeyen rahibemiz, bu yavrulara sahip çıktı." {n}Abelard, bir araya toplanan çocuklara bakıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium'un{/g} yerini tutamaz ancak öksüzlerin bakımı üstlenildi ve eğitim ihtiyaçları karşılanıyor."
languages.original_text: "Our indefatigable sister has been keeping an eye on these pups." {n}Abelard glances at the gathered children.{/n} "It is hardly the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} in here, but we have provided the orphans on our ship with adequate care and instruction."

traits.locale_text: "Yorulmak nedir bilmeyen rahibemiz bu yavrulara sahip çıktı." {n}Abelard, bir araya toplanan çocuklara bakıyor.{/n} "Burası, {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}'un yerini tutamaz ancak öksüzlerin bakımı üstlenildi ve eğitim ihtiyaçları karşılanıyor."
